title: VR-Based Advanced Nursing Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic nursing skills and patient assessment knowledge
context.additional_context: Experiential learning utilizing VR simulations that mimic real clinical environments

learning_goals: Learners accurately analyze severe patients' biometric signals in a VR environment and perform nursing interventions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners fully comply with infection control protocols during three consecutive practice sessions while interacting with virtual patients.
Learners can specifically suggest three or more team collaboration improvements during debriefing after VR simulation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
